name: part_005
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】ReGLOSS 1st Live ＂Flashpoint＂【有明アリーナ】 [wlPLYUOmtHE]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

subtitles.original: 最後までライブを楽しんでいただくために、いくつかご案内させていただきます。
subtitles.english: To ensure you enjoy the live show until the end, we have a few announcements.

subtitles.original: 公演中の撮影・録音・録画機材の使用は固くお断りいたします。
subtitles.english: The use of photography, recording, and video equipment during the performance is strictly prohibited.

subtitles.original: 万が一、具合が悪くなってしまった場合は無理をせず、近くのスタッフへお知らせください。
subtitles.english: If you happen to feel unwell, please do not push yourself and inform a nearby staff member.

subtitles.original: 会場内でのモッシュ、ダイブ、大きく飛び跳ねる、ステージに物を...
subtitles.english: Moshing, diving, jumping high, throwing objects onto the stage...

subtitles.original: ステージに、も、も...
subtitles.english: Onto the stage... th-th...

subtitles.original: 大丈夫？大丈夫だよ
subtitles.english: Are you okay? It's okay.

subtitles.original: すいませんね！あの、収録とかじゃないんでね！
subtitles.english: Sorry about that! Uh, it's not like this is a recording or anything!

subtitles.original: 緊張してるね
subtitles.english: She's nervous.

subtitles.original: 緊張してます、ごめんなさい、もう一回やらせてくださいごめんなさい！
subtitles.english: I'm nervous, I'm sorry! Please let me do it one more time, sorry!

subtitles.original: 休み休みね、みんなの声もあるからね
subtitles.english: Take your time, everyone's cheering for you.

subtitles.original: えー、会場内でのモッシュ、ダイブ、大きく飛び跳ねる、ステージに物を投げ込むなど、
subtitles.english: Um, moshing, diving, jumping high, throwing objects onto the stage,

subtitles.original: 他の、みんなの迷惑になったり、公演を妨げる行為は一切禁止です。
subtitles.english: and any other acts that cause trouble for others or interfere with the performance are strictly prohibited.

subtitles.original: ルールを守って盛り上がってくださいね！
subtitles.english: Please follow the rules and have a blast!

subtitles.original: 抹茶！
subtitles.english: Matcha!

subtitles.original: 本公演は、映像配信および写真撮影用のカメラが会場内に入り、客席が映り込む場合がございます。
subtitles.english: This performance will have cameras for video streaming and photography, and the audience may be captured.

subtitles.original: 映像や写真はプロモーションなどに使用される可能性がございますので、予めご了承ください。
subtitles.english: Please note that the footage and photos may be used for promotional purposes.

subtitles.original: 委員長！
subtitles.english: Chairperson!

subtitles.original: ライブのハッシュタグは、#ReGLOSS1stLive です！
subtitles.english: The hashtag for the live concert is #ReGLOSS1stLive!

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグを使ってたくさん盛り上げてください！
subtitles.english: Use the hashtag and hype it up a lot!

subtitles.original: それでは開演までもう少々...
subtitles.english: Well then, just a little longer until the show starts...

subtitles.original: 盛り上がる準備はできてますかー！
subtitles.english: Are you ready to get hype?!

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: みんなで一緒に盛り上がろうー！
subtitles.english: Let's all get hype together!

subtitles.original: 以上、ReGLOSSでした！
subtitles.english: That's all from ReGLOSS!

subtitles.original: 上機嫌に Play the wake up people
subtitles.english: In a good mood, play the wake up, people.

subtitles.original: 描く計画で Get a 希望
subtitles.english: Get a hope with the plan we draw.

subtitles.original: どんなシーズンも駆けつけ Pretty good OK
subtitles.english: Rushing to any season, pretty good, OK.

subtitles.original: 1人じゃ足りない この声より
subtitles.english: More than this voice that isn't enough alone.

subtitles.original: The sounds force 頂の私 Command C
subtitles.english: The sounds force, me at the summit, Command C.

subtitles.original: 何も消さない...
subtitles.english: I won't erase anything...

subtitles.original: いつもそばにいるけれど
subtitles.english: I'm always by your side, but...

subtitles.original: 妙に面白い風変わり
subtitles.english: Strangely interesting and eccentric.

subtitles.original: 胸踊る巡り合いは一期一会
subtitles.english: This heart-pounding encounter is a once-in-a-lifetime chance.

subtitles.original: 偶然の...
subtitles.english: A coincidence's...

subtitles.original: 全部ひっさげて包み込む
subtitles.english: Carrying everything and wrapping it up.

subtitles.original: Flashpoint!
subtitles.english: Flashpoint!

subtitles.original: 移ろい色褪せるように
subtitles.english: Like changing and fading colors.

subtitles.original: 秘密の奥...
subtitles.english: Deep in the secret...

subtitles.original: 春が来た パッと桜舞う
subtitles.english: Spring has come, suddenly cherry blossoms dance.

subtitles.original: Show timeで儚いね 笑って Enjoy
subtitles.english: It's show time and it's fleeting, so smile and enjoy.

subtitles.original: 踊ってみた様 アルゴリズムの中
subtitles.english: Like I tried dancing inside the algorithm.

subtitles.original: ちょっと背伸びして
subtitles.english: Stretching a little.

subtitles.original: 酔いが覚めるまで
subtitles.english: Until I sober up.

subtitles.original: この世界を
subtitles.english: This world...

subtitles.original: 塗り替えるとは
subtitles.english: to repaint it.

subtitles.original: きっと信じないけど
subtitles.english: Surely you won't believe it, but...

subtitles.original: 君の中の世界なら変えられるはず
subtitles.english: If it's the world inside you, it should be changeable.

subtitles.original: 根付いて咲いて実って枯れて
subtitles.english: Take root, bloom, bear fruit, and wither.

subtitles.original: 何ひとつ無駄じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because not a single thing is a waste.

subtitles.original: 最高に君が笑ってくれれば
subtitles.english: If you just smile your best...

subtitles.original: もうそれだけでいい
subtitles.english: that alone is enough.
